Instructions for preparing an afrimesh development environment under Ubuntu

= Dependencies =

Run as required:

  * httpd: 
  {{{
  apt-get install apache2
  }}}
  * radius:   
  {{{
  apt-get install freeradius freeradius-mysql
  }}}
  * mysql:  
  {{{
  apt-get install mysql-server mysql-client mysql-common libmysql++-dev
  }}}
  * net-snmp:  
  {{{
  apt-get install snmp
  apt-get install libsnmp-dev 
  }}}
  * curl:
  {{{
  apt-get install curl
  }}}
  * wget:
  {{{
  apt-get install wget
  }}}
  * libuci:
  {{{
  wget http://afrimesh.googlecode.com/files/libuci-0.7.3_i386.deb
  dpkg -i libuci-0.7.3_i386.deb
  }}}
  * libjson:
  {{{
  wget http://afrimesh.googlecode.com/files/libjson-0.8_i386.deb
  dpkg -i libjson-0.8_i386.deb
  }}}
